result.title: "Package of “Recommendations” from five clusters: 1) Use and design of space, 2) Mobility and accessibility for all"", 3) Urban logistics, 4) Shared mobility, 5) Active modes"
result.description: "A dedicated deliverable will be contain a set of “Cluster recommendations” from each of the following five thematic clusters: 1) Use and design of space, 2) Mobility and accessibility for all"", 3) Urban logistics, 4) Shared mobility, 5) Active modes. These recommendations will also be available to non-cluster members, Take-Up Cities and the public at large through the Pathfinder. The responsibility for the production of the individual cluster recommendations rests with the respective cluster leader. The WP leader Rupprecht is responsible for their compilation into one package. "

result.title: Project website and communication toolkit
result.description: Project website and communication toolkit. A project identity set will be created consisting of: • a project logo, a graphic chart and a set of templates (Powerpoint, Meeting report…), • a project brochure to be distributed during special events (i.e.EC conferences and congresses.), • a poster/banner to present the project, • a project public website, to be created at the beginning of the project, with non-confidential information on the project background and goals (e.g. http://www.INGREEN.eu) • a video in two parts, the first part presenting the objectives and the partners the project at month 36 and the second part at month 30 adding the main public results.
